As you wish, {source.display_name}~

{target.display_name} is already a beautiful statue.

*Pyralis looks puzzled.*
{target.display_name} isn't one of my statues.
*Pyralis squints at {target.display_name}* I don't remember you being a statue... Be free, my child.
My priest wants you as a statue, {target.display_name}. You shall stay as such until they say otherwise.

{target.display_name} has offered themselves as tribute to me. They shall remain that way until I decide otherwise.
*Pyralis smiles at {target.display_name} and returns their body to flesh and blood.*

{target.display_name} - your tribute time is up.
*Pyralis frees them from petrification.*
